short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps users find the unique selector on websites. (by Aider Aliiev)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instructions for using the "Mgid SingleJS Selector Helper" plugin

Activate the plugin:
Click on the plugin icon in your browser. In the window that appears, click the "Start" button.

Select an element on the page:
Hover your mouse over the article container. The selected element will be highlighted in red. Click on the item to lock the selection.

Customize the selection using the keyboard:
Use the arrows on the keyboard to fine-tune:
Down arrow - move to the next neighbor on the same level.
Up arrow - move to the previous neighbor on the same level.
Right arrow - go deeper into the first nested element.
Left arrow - exit to the parent element.

When the desired element is selected, press Enter to confirm the selection.

Copy the selector:
After confirmation, a unique selector will be automatically generated and copied to the clipboard.

Result:
Use the copied selector in your tasks (e.g. simple js, etc.).
